mapper.sql: SIG_ID, SIG_AC_ID, SIG_PER_ID, SIG_PER_NAME, SIG_DATE, SIG_HAN_DATE, SIG_DOC_ID, SIG_DOC1_NAME, SIG_DOC2_NAME, SIG_DOC3_NAME, SIG_STATUS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sign
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sign (SIG_ID, SIG_AC_ID, SIG_PER_ID, SIG_PER_NAME, SIG_DATE, SIG_HAN_DATE, SIG_DOC_ID, SIG_DOC1_NAME, SIG_DOC2_NAME, SIG_DOC3_NAME, SIG_STATUS) values (#{sigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sigAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sigPerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sigPerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sigDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sigHanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sigDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sigDoc1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sigDoc2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sigDoc3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sigStatus,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into sign
SIG_ID,
SIG_AC_ID,
SIG_PER_ID,
SIG_PER_NAME,
SIG_DATE,
SIG_HAN_DATE,
SIG_DOC_ID,
SIG_DOC1_NAME,
SIG_DOC2_NAME,
SIG_DOC3_NAME,
SIG_STATUS,

mapper.update:
update sign
SIG_ID = #{record.sigId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIG_AC_ID = #{record.sigAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIG_PER_ID = #{record.sigPerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_PER_NAME = #{record.sigPerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DATE = #{record.sigDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIG_HAN_DATE = #{record.sigHanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIG_DOC_ID = #{record.sigDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DOC1_NAME = #{record.sigDoc1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DOC2_NAME = #{record.sigDoc2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DOC3_NAME = #{record.sigDoc3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_STATUS = #{record.sigStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

update sign set SIG_ID = #{record.sigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SIG_AC_ID = #{record.sigAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SIG_PER_ID = #{record.sigPerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_PER_NAME = #{record.sigPerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DATE = #{record.sigDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SIG_HAN_DATE = #{record.sigHanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SIG_DOC_ID = #{record.sigDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DOC1_NAME = #{record.sigDoc1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DOC2_NAME = #{record.sigDoc2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DOC3_NAME = #{record.sigDoc3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_STATUS = #{record.sigStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}

update sign
SIG_AC_ID = #{sigAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIG_PER_ID = #{sigPerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_PER_NAME = #{sigPerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DATE = #{sigDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIG_HAN_DATE = #{sigHanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIG_DOC_ID = #{sigDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DOC1_NAME = #{sigDoc1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DOC2_NAME = #{sigDoc2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_DOC3_NAME = #{sigDoc3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIG_STATUS = #{sigStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
where SIG_ID = #{sigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sign set SIG_AC_ID = #{sigAcId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SIG_PER_ID = #{sigPerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_PER_NAME = #{sigPerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DATE = #{sigDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SIG_HAN_DATE = #{sigHanDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SIG_DOC_ID = #{sigDocId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DOC1_NAME = #{sigDoc1Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DOC2_NAME = #{sigDoc2Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_DOC3_NAME = #{sigDoc3Name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIG_STATUS = #{sigStatus,jdbcType=CHAR} where SIG_ID = #{sigId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select SIG_STATUS from sign where SIG_AC_ID = #{acId} and SIG_PER_ID = #{sigPerId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sign where SIG_AC_ID= #{acId} and SIG_STATUS = '0'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sign where SIG_AC_ID= #{acId} and SIG_STATUS <> '0'

select AC_TYPE,USER_NAME as AC_CRE_NAME, AC_CRE_DATE, AC_DUE_DATE, AC_SIG_DUE_DATE, AC_TITLE, AC_DESC, AC_DOC1_NAME, AC_DOC2_NAME, AC_DOC3_NAME , from sign,activity,user where USER_ID = AC_CRE_ID and SIG_PER_ID= #{sigPerId} and sign.SIG_AC_ID = activity.AC_ID order by SIG_DATE DESC limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sign where SIG_PER_ID= #{sigPerId}
SELECT SIG_PER_ID,SIG_PER_NAME FROM sign where SIG_AC_ID= #{acId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sign where SIG_AC_ID = #{acId}

select
from sign where SIG_AC_ID= #{acId} and SIG_STATUS = '0' and SIG_PER_ID in (select USER_ID from user where USER_ACADEMY in (select USER_ACADEMY from user where USER_ID = #{userId}) and USER_GRADE in (select USER_GRADE from user where USER_ID = #{userId})) order by SIG_DATE DESC limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) from sign where SIG_AC_ID= #{acId} and SIG_STATUS = '0' and SIG_PER_ID in (select USER_ID from user where USER_ACADEMY in (select USER_ACADEMY from user where USER_ID = #{userId}) and USER_GRADE in (select USER_GRADE from user where USER_ID = #{userId}))

select
from sign where SIG_AC_ID= #{acId} and SIG_STATUS <> '0' and SIG_PER_ID in (select USER_ID from user where USER_ACADEMY in (select USER_ACADEMY from user where USER_ID = #{userId}) and USER_GRADE in (select USER_GRADE from user where USER_ID = #{userId})) order by SIG_DATE DESC limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) from sign where SIG_AC_ID= #{acId} and SIG_STATUS <> '0' and SIG_PER_ID in (select USER_ID from user where USER_ACADEMY in (select USER_ACADEMY from user where USER_ID = #{userId}) and USER_GRADE in (select USER_GRADE from user where USER_ID = #{userId}))
